languages.text: "Исключено. С начала вахты тут развернут штаб дознания, чернь не прошла бы незамеченной. Да и простой трубовед недостаточно грамотен, чтобы общаться с машинным духом. Убийце кто-то помогал".

"Impossible. Since the start of the watch, this area has been used as the centre of operations. No rabble could have slipped by unnoticed. Moreover, a common pipewarden wouldn't know how to commune with a machine spirit. The murderer had help."
languages.original_text: "Исключено. С начала вахты тут развернут штаб дознания, чернь не прошла бы незамеченной. Да и простой трубовед недостаточно грамотен, чтобы общаться с машинным духом. Убийце кто-то помогал".

"Impossible. Since the start of the watch, this area has been used as the centre of operations. No rabble could have slipped by unnoticed. Moreover, a common pipewarden wouldn't know how to commune with a machine spirit. The murderer had help."

languages.text: « Impossible. Depuis le début de ce quart, ce secteur fait office de quartier général. Personne n'a pu s'introduire ici sans se faire repérer. En outre, un simple égoutier serait bien incapable de communier avec un esprit de la machine. L'assassin avait forcément un complice. »
languages.original_text: "Impossible. Since the start of the watch, this area has been used as the centre of operations. No rabble could have slipped by unnoticed. Moreover, a common pipewarden wouldn't know how to commune with a machine spirit. The murderer had help."

traits.locale_text: « Impossible. Depuis le début de ce quart, ce secteur fait office de quartier général. Personne n'a pu s'introduire ici sans se faire repérer. En outre, un simple égoutier serait bien incapable de communier avec un esprit de la machine. L'assassin avait forcément un complice. »

languages.text: «Imposible. Se ha usado esta zona como centro de operaciones desde que comenzó la guardia. Ningún plebeyo podría haber entrado sin ser visto. Además, un inspector de tuberías corriente no sabría entrar en comunión con un espíritu máquina. Alguien ha ayudado al asesino».
languages.original_text: "Impossible. Since the start of the watch, this area has been used as the centre of operations. No rabble could have slipped by unnoticed. Moreover, a common pipewarden wouldn't know how to commune with a machine spirit. The murderer had help."

traits.locale_text: «Imposible. Se ha usado esta zona como centro de operaciones desde que comenzó la guardia. Ningún plebeyo podría haber entrado sin ser visto. Además, un inspector de tuberías corriente no sabría entrar en comunión con un espíritu máquina. Alguien ha ayudado al asesino».

languages.text: “这不可能。自从这一巡开始，这片地区一直都是业务处理中心，普通船员根本不可能悄无声息地溜过来。而且，普通管道员根本不明白该如何与机魂进行交流，凶手肯定是另有帮手。”
languages.original_text: "Impossible. Since the start of the watch, this area has been used as the centre of operations. No rabble could have slipped by unnoticed. Moreover, a common pipewarden wouldn't know how to commune with a machine spirit. The murderer had help."

traits.locale_text: “这不可能。自从这一巡开始，这片地区一直都是业务处理中心，普通船员根本不可能悄无声息地溜过来。而且，普通管道员根本不明白该如何与机魂进行交流，凶手肯定是另有帮手。”

languages.text: 「不可能だ。ウォッチの始まりから、この地域は中心部として使われてきた。誰にも気が付かれずに、ここを通り過ぎることは不可能だ。しかも、普通のパイプ監視員は機械精霊と交信する方法を知らないはずだ。犯人には協力者がいたんだ。」
languages.original_text: "Impossible. Since the start of the watch, this area has been used as the centre of operations. No rabble could have slipped by unnoticed. Moreover, a common pipewarden wouldn't know how to commune with a machine spirit. The murderer had help."

traits.locale_text: 「不可能だ。ウォッチの始まりから、この地域は中心部として使われてきた。誰にも気が付かれずに、ここを通り過ぎることは不可能だ。しかも、普通のパイプ監視員は機械精霊と交信する方法を知らないはずだ。犯人には協力者がいたんだ。」

languages.text: "Unmöglich. Seit dem Beginn der Wache dient dieser Bereich als Operationszentrum. Es kann kein Pöbel unbemerkt vorbeigeschlichen sein. Zudem wüsste ein einfacher Rohrhüter gar nicht, wie man mit einem Maschinengeist Zwiesprache hält. Der Mörder hatte Hilfe."
languages.original_text: "Impossible. Since the start of the watch, this area has been used as the centre of operations. No rabble could have slipped by unnoticed. Moreover, a common pipewarden wouldn't know how to commune with a machine spirit. The murderer had help."

traits.locale_text: "Unmöglich. Seit dem Beginn der Wache dient dieser Bereich als Operationszentrum. Es kann kein Pöbel unbemerkt vorbeigeschlichen sein. Zudem wüsste ein einfacher Rohrhüter gar nicht, wie man mit einem Maschinengeist Zwiesprache hält. Der Mörder hatte Hilfe."

languages.text: "Mümkün değil. Vardiyanın başından beri bu alan operasyon merkezi olarak kullanılıyordu. Ayaktakımından kimse, fark edilmeden geçemez. Dahası alelade bir hat muhafızı, makine ruhu ile nasıl iletişime geçeceğini bilemez. Katil yardım almış."
languages.original_text: "Impossible. Since the start of the watch, this area has been used as the centre of operations. No rabble could have slipped by unnoticed. Moreover, a common pipewarden wouldn't know how to commune with a machine spirit. The murderer had help."
